pkgmetadata.longdescription: Asyncio high level UDP sockets==============================Asyncio high level UDP sockets.Project homepage: https://github.com/eerimoq/asyncudpDocumentation: https://asyncudp.readthedocs.org/en/latestInstallation============.. code-block:: python $ pip install asyncudpExample client==============.. code-block:: python import asyncio import asyncudp async def main(): sock = await asyncudp.create_socket(remote_addr=('127.0.0.1', 9999)) sock.sendto(b'Hello!') print(await sock.recvfrom()) sock.close() asyncio.run(main())Example server==============.. code-block:: python import asyncio import asyncudp async def main(): sock = await asyncudp.create_socket(local_addr=('127.0.0.1', 9999)) while True: data, addr = await sock.recvfrom() print(data, addr) sock.sendto(data, addr) asyncio.run(main())Test====.. code-block:: $ python3 -m unittest
